text:
e="preserve">Vicenç Capdevila Cardona (28 October 1936–21 March 2020) was a Spanish lawyer and politician. He was mayor of Hospitalet de Llobregat from 1973 to 1977. He also was a Deputy of Congress from 1977 to 1979, representing Barcelona and a member of member parliament of Catalonia from 1980 to 1984, representing Barcelona.
He died on 21 March 2020 of COVID-19 in Barcelona at the age of 83.
